channel.title: [PI] Experience Lamp (Kind of)
channel.description: Alright everybody I'm adding dungeoneering to my RSPS and well......I'm twelve and have been coding for less than a eyar so you can imgaine how that's going. But, back to the main thing. I have no way to make the monsters give you dungeneering expierience when you kill them so I have decided to make a Experience Lamp that gives Dungeoneering Expierience. The way you will obtain it is by cashing in Dungeoneering Tokens. When I click on the lamp, an interface pops up that says click the skill you wish to advance. When you click on skills they don't select or advance. What I want to do is make it so that the interface doesnt pop up and it just gives you 5 million Dungeoneering Xp. I have no idea how to do this, if somebody can tell me the file to look in I can figure it out. I do not think it is in ActionHandler.Java. Thanks!!!! Please get back to me ASAP

item.title: [PI] Experience Lamp (Kind of)
item.dc:creator: @koala_sex koala sex
item.description:
@koala_sex wrote:

iv got this problem but i want it to add tokens can u please code me it please
c.getPA().addSkillXP(5000000, c.playerDung);
like that but make it add tokens

Read full topic

item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

The same way you would with slayer, except you would appoint experience to dungeoneering instead of slayer.

item.description:
@Owner_Chaos wrote:

Thanks guys! It worked! Kind of…to make dung I renamed Summoning since it didn’t work anyway lol…so i changed your help a little and got it to work. Here’s kind of a long shot: Anybody know hwo to make em get dung xpf rom killing monsters?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Experience Lamp (Kind of)
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I believe the experience lamp id is 2528, so what you would do is go to ClickItem.java and search for 2528. You should see something like…

if(itemId == 2528) { c.getPA().showInterface(2808); }

You need to change “c.getPA().showInterface(2808);” to how you add experience. I believe in PI it goes something like this…
addSkillXP(Amount of experience, skill id); I don’t know what the id is for dungeoneering since you had to add that skill on your own… I’m just going to use what Fridder used.

if (itemId == 2528) { c.getPA().addSkillXP(5000000, c.playerDung); }

You seem smart and willing to learn. If you need anymore help or don’t understand something, ask.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Experience Lamp (Kind of)
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

ClickItem.java

	if (itemId == ~~~~) {
		//c.getPA().addSkillXP(xp * Config.DUNG_EXPERIENCE, c.playerDung);
		c.getPA().addSkillXP(50000);
	}

[s]Config.java

public static final int DUNG_EXPERIENCE = 80;//change 80 to whatever you want...[/s]

Hmm try that

Read full topic
